title: feat: extract upstream error messages from JSON
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Clearer signals from the hive
gist.blurb: Sometimes upstream services buzz in riddles. We've taught our proxy to translate those cryptic JSON errors into plain English.
gist.summary: Improved the API proxy to parse upstream JSON error responses and extract the most meaningful message fields automatically.
gist.impact: Developers will receive clear, actionable error descriptions instead of raw JSON dumps when upstream services fail.
gist.visual_concept: The concept is 'clarity from chaos'. The Robot (who usually sees things) is holding a printout that was previously static/garbled, but now shows clear text. The Bee is helping adjust the antenna/signal.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute robot with a monitor head holding a data printout that clearly reads 'OOPS'. The bee mascot hovers nearby adjusting a lime green (#ecf874) antenna to clear the signal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Cute robot and bee with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'OOPS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
